title: Game Character Outlaw
description: The Outlaw’s voice profile is southern, deep, warm with a pronounced country vocal performance.
longDescription:
Audio Demo


AAA Game Character Outlaw voice library featuring a boisterous, cocky collection of designed human voice over sound files created for realistic games & trailers. This voice-over sound library features a cowboy outlaw, male antagonist game character inspired by the 1800’s, western cowboy movies & popular cowboy games.


  • 385 male voice-over audio files
  • 198.3 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format
  • 18 minuets of game ready & optimized audio


You may also be interested in:

Strange Game Ambient Loops

Music for Advertising & Film

Retro Game

Ancient Game Sounds


AAA Game Character Outlaw voiceover sound library provides you with more than 380+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, fighting and pain sounds, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. 


The Outlaw’s voice profile is southern, deep, warm with a pronounced country vocal performance. He is perfect for stagecoach robbers, outlaws, criminals, in-game non-player characters or any antagonist game characters with western dialect aesthetics. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.


UCS Compliant


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it super easy to navigate to the right sounds. With 385 voice over audio files and 150 custom dialogue lines such as “Stick Em’ Up Partner, Cheating At Poker, Now You’ll Die”. This pack has plenty of options to help your game characters come to life. 


AAA Game Character Outlaws voice over sound effects is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic western stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments and so much more. 


Product details:

  • 385 male voice-over audio files
  • 198.3 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format
  • 18 minuets of game ready & optimized audio
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • Universal Category System (UCS) compliant
  • AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for NPC, antagonist characters, criminal, country person, cowboy
  • 150 stock NPC dialogue lines
  • 135 custom character specific dialogue lines
  • 13 crying - sad, groan, regret, dying
  • 15 drunken sayings & dialogue lines
  • 18 fighting vocals
  • 17 jumping sounds
  • 14 male laughing sounds
  • 23 pain grunts and vocalizations
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
